DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study was to compare time and success rates of TruView PCD video laryngoscope and Macintosh laryngoscope for the pediatric emergency intubation with three airway scenarios in a standardized manikin model.
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent to participate in the study inexperienced in pediatric intubation paramedics not meet the above criteria participants who had performed intubation in pediatric humans prior the trial or had previously TruView experience
